21  package org.opencastproject.external.userdirectory;
22  
23  import static java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets.UTF_8;
24  
25  import org.opencastproject.security.api.Organization;
26  import org.opencastproject.security.api.OrganizationDirectoryService;
27  import org.opencastproject.security.api.SecurityConstants;
28  import org.opencastproject.security.api.SecurityService;
29  import org.opencastproject.security.api.UnauthorizedException;
30  import org.opencastproject.security.impl.jpa.JpaGroup;
31  import org.opencastproject.security.impl.jpa.JpaOrganization;
32  import org.opencastproject.security.impl.jpa.JpaRole;
33  import org.opencastproject.security.util.SecurityUtil;
34  import org.opencastproject.userdirectory.JpaGroupRoleProvider;
35  import org.opencastproject.util.NotFoundException;
36  import org.opencastproject.util.UrlSupport;
37  
38  import org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils;
39  import org.apache.commons.lang3.BooleanUtils;
40  import org.osgi.service.component.ComponentContext;
41  import org.osgi.service.component.annotations.Activate;
42  import org.osgi.service.component.annotations.Component;
43  import org.osgi.service.component.annotations.Reference;
44  import org.slf4j.Logger;
45  import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
46  
47  import java.io.IOException;
48  import java.io.InputStream;
49  import java.util.Dictionary;
50  import java.util.HashSet;
51  import java.util.Objects;
52  import java.util.Set;
53  import java.util.TreeSet;
54  
55  /**
56   * The external group loader
57   */
58  @Component(
59      immediate = true,
60      service = ExternalGroupLoader.class,
61      property = {
62          "service.description=External group loader"
63      }
64  )
65  public class ExternalGroupLoader {
66  
67    /** The logging facility */
68    private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(ExternalGroupLoader.class);
69  
70    /** The config key, which specifies whether default groups should be created */
71    public static final String SHOULD_CREATE_DEFAULT_GROUPS_CONFIG_KEY = "create_default_groups";
72  
73    /** The external applications group suffix */
74    public static final String EXTERNAL_GROUP_SUFFIX = "_EXTERNAL_APPLICATIONS";
75  
76    /** Path to the list of roles */
77    public static final String ROLES_PATH_PREFIX = "/roles";
78  
79    /** The path to the external applications list of roles */
80    public static final String EXTERNAL_APPLICATIONS_ROLES_FILE = "external-applications";
81  
82    /** The group role provider */
83    protected JpaGroupRoleProvider groupRoleProvider;
84  
85    /** The organization directory service */
86    protected OrganizationDirectoryService organizationDirectoryService;
87  
88    /** The security service to use to run as the context for adding the groups */
89    protected SecurityService securityService;
90  
91    /**
92     * @param groupRoleProvider
93     *          the groupRoleProvider to set
94     */
95    @Reference
96    public void setGroupRoleProvider(JpaGroupRoleProvider groupRoleProvider) {
97      this.groupRoleProvider = groupRoleProvider;
98    }
99  
100   /**
101    * @param organizationDirectoryService
102    *          the organizationDirectoryService to set
103    */
104   @Reference
105   public void setOrganizationDirectoryService(OrganizationDirectoryService organizationDirectoryService) {
106     this.organizationDirectoryService = organizationDirectoryService;
107   }
108 
109   @Reference
110   public void setSecurityService(SecurityService securityService) {
111     this.securityService = securityService;
112   }
113 
114   /**
115    * Callback for activation of this component.
116    *
117    * @param cc
118    *          the component context
119    */
120   @Activate
121   public void activate(ComponentContext cc) throws Exception {
122     logger.debug("Activate external group loader");
123 
124     Dictionary properties = cc.getProperties();
125     boolean shouldCreateDefaultGroups = BooleanUtils.toBoolean(Objects.toString(properties.get(SHOULD_CREATE_DEFAULT_GROUPS_CONFIG_KEY), "true"));
126 
127     if (shouldCreateDefaultGroups) {
128       createDefaultGroups(cc);
129     } else {
130       logger.info("Disabled generation of External Application group");
131     }
132   }
133 
134   /**
135    * Creates initial groups for external applications per organization
136    *
137    * @throws IllegalStateException
138    *           if a specified role or user list is unavailable
139    */
140   private void createDefaultGroups(ComponentContext cc) {
141     for (final Organization organization : organizationDirectoryService.getOrganizations()) {
142       SecurityUtil.runAs(securityService, organization, SecurityUtil.createSystemUser(cc, organization), () -> {
143         try {
144           Organization testOrg = organizationDirectoryService.getOrganization(organization.getId());
145           if (!(testOrg instanceof JpaOrganization)) {
146             logger.info("Note: Ignoring organization with id " + testOrg.getId() + " because it is not a JpaOrganization");
147             return;
148           }
149           JpaOrganization org = (JpaOrganization) testOrg;
150 
151           // External Applications
152           String externalApplicationsGroupId = org.getId().toUpperCase().concat(EXTERNAL_GROUP_SUFFIX);
153           JpaGroup externalApplicationGroup = groupRoleProvider.loadGroup(externalApplicationsGroupId,
154                   org.getId());
155           if (externalApplicationGroup == null) {
156             String externalApplicationsGroupname = org.getName().concat(" External Applications");
157             String externalApplicationsGroupDescription = "External application users of '" + org.getName() + "'";
158             Set<JpaRole> roles = new HashSet<JpaRole>();
159             for (String role : loadRoles(EXTERNAL_APPLICATIONS_ROLES_FILE)) {
160               roles.add(new JpaRole(role, org));
161             }
162             roles.add(new JpaRole(SecurityConstants.GLOBAL_SUDO_ROLE, org));
163             externalApplicationGroup = new JpaGroup(externalApplicationsGroupId, org, externalApplicationsGroupname,
164                     externalApplicationsGroupDescription, roles, new HashSet<String>());
165             groupRoleProvider.addGroup(externalApplicationGroup);
166           }
167         } catch (NotFoundException | IllegalStateException | IOException | UnauthorizedException e) {
168           logger.error("Unable to load external API groups", e);
169         }
170       });
171     }
172   }
173 
174   /**
175    * Loads the set of roles from the properties file.
176    *
177    * @param roleFileName
178    *          name of the properties file containing the roles
179    * @return the set of roles
180    */
181   private Set<String> loadRoles(String roleFileName) throws IllegalStateException, IOException {
182     String propertiesFile = UrlSupport.concat(ROLES_PATH_PREFIX, roleFileName);
183 
184       // Load the properties
185     try (InputStream rolesIS = getClass().getResourceAsStream(propertiesFile)) {
186       return new TreeSet<>(IOUtils.readLines(rolesIS, UTF_8));
187     } catch (IOException e) {
188       logger.error("Error loading roles from file {}", propertiesFile);
189       throw e;
190     }
191 
192   }
193 
194 }
